detaileddescription.para: CRC size in bytes.
Value to disable all interrupts.

briefdescription.para: This value can be used as a parameter for the nrf_nfct_mod_ctrl_pin_set function to specify that a given NFCT signal (MODULATION CONTROL) must not be connected to a physical pin.
Maximum possible value of NFCT max frame delay.
Symbol indicating whether NFCID1 register uses new layout.
Symbol indicating whether NFCT STOPTX event is present.
Symbol indicating whether pin select for modulation control register is present.
Symbol indicating whether modulation output select register is present.
Symbol indicating whether current operating state of NFC tag register is present.
Symbol indicating whether sleep state during automatic collision resolution is present.
Symbol indicating whether automatic collision resolution control register is present.
Symbol indicating whether NFC pad configuration register is present.
Symbol indicating whether NFC bias configuration trim register is present.

detaileddescription.para: Activate the NFCT peripheral for the incoming and outgoing frames, change state to activated.
Disable the NFCT peripheral.
Enable the NFC sense field mode, change state to sense mode.
Start the transmission of an outgoing frame, change state to transmit.
Stop an issued transmission of a frame.
Initialize EasyDMA for receive.
Force state machine to the IDLE state.
Force state machine to the SLEEP_A state.

briefdescription.para: NFCT tasks.

detaileddescription.para: The NFCT peripheral is ready to receive and send frames.
Remote NFC field is detected.
Remote NFC field is lost.
The start of the first symbol of a transmitted frame.
The end of the last transmitted on-air symbol of a frame.
The end of the first symbol of a received frame.
Received data was checked (CRC, parity) and transferred to RAM, and EasyDMA ended accessing the RX buffer.
NFC error reported. The ERRORSTATUS register contains details on the source of the error.
NFC RX frame error reported. The FRAMESTATUS.RX register contains details on the source of the error.
RX buffer (as defined by PACKETPTR and MAXLEN) in Data RAM full.
Transmission of data in RAM ended, and EasyDMA ended accessing the TX buffer.
Auto collision resolution process started.
NFC auto collision resolution error reported.
NFC auto collision resolution successfully completed.
EasyDMA is ready to receive or send frames.

briefdescription.para: NFCT events.

detaileddescription.para: Shortcut between the FIELDDETECTED event and the ACTIVATE task.
Shortcut between the FIELDLOST event and the SENSE task.
Shortcut between the TXFRAMEEND event and the ENABLERXDATA task.

briefdescription.para: NFCT shortcuts.

detaileddescription.para: Interrupt on READY event.
Interrupt on FIELDDETECTED event.
Interrupt on FIELDLOST event.
Interrupt on TXFRAMESTART event.
Interrupt on TXFRAMEEND event.
Interrupt on RXFRAMESTART event.
Interrupt on RXFRAMEEND event.
Interrupt on ERROR event.
Interrupt on RXERROR event.
Interrupt on ENDRX event.
Interrupt on ENDTX event.
Interrupt on AUTOCOLRESSTARTED event.
Interrupt on COLLISION event.
Interrupt on SELECTED event.
Interrupt on STARTED event.

briefdescription.para: NFCT interrupts.

detaileddescription.para: Timeout of the Frame Delay Timer (no frame transmission started in the FDT window).
Field level is too high at maximum load resistance.
Field level is too low at minimum load resistance.

briefdescription.para: NFC error status bit masks.

detaileddescription.para: CRC status mask.
Parity status mask.
Overrun status mask.

briefdescription.para: NFC received frame status bit masks.

detaileddescription.para: Disabled or sensing NFC field.
Ramping up.
Idle.
Receiving data.
Counting Frame Delay Time since the last symbol of the last received frame.
Transmitting data.

briefdescription.para: NFC tag state.

detaileddescription.para: 'IDLE' state.
'SLEEP_A' state.

briefdescription.para: NFC tag sleep state.

detaileddescription.para: Shows the sleep state during automatic collision resolution according to the NFC Forum Activity Technical Specification v2.0.
Field presence mask.
Field lock mask.

briefdescription.para: NFC field state bit masks.

detaileddescription.para: Frame transmission starts when NRF_NFCT_TASK_STARTTX is set (delay timer is not used).
Frame transmission starts in a window between FRAMEDELAYMIN and FRAMEDELAYMAX.
Frame transmission starts when the delay timer reaches FRAMEDELAYMAX.
Frame transmission starts in a bit grid between FRAMEDELAYMIN and FRAMEDELAYMAX.

briefdescription.para: NFC frame delay mode for data transmission.

detaileddescription.para: Indicates whether parity is added in the transmitted frames.
Indicates whether unused bits are discarded at the start or at the end of the transmitted frames.
Indicates whether SoF symbol is added in the transmitted frames.
Indicates whether CRC is added in the transmitted frames.

briefdescription.para: Bit masks for NFC transmission frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: Indicates whether parity is expected in the received frames.
Indicates whether SoF symbol is expected in the received frames.
Indicates whether CRC is expected and checked in the received frames.

briefdescription.para: Bit masks for NFC reception frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: Single size NFCID1 (4 bytes).
Double size NFCID1 (7 bytes).
Triple size NFCID1 (10 bytes).
Default size. Use this option to leave NFCID1 size unchanged.

briefdescription.para: 'NFCI1 size' NFC field configuration for the SENS_RES frame according to the NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification.

detaileddescription.para: SDD pattern 00000.
SDD pattern 00001.
SDD pattern 00010.
SDD pattern 00100.
SDD pattern 01000.
SDD pattern 10000.

briefdescription.para: 'Bit frame SDD' NFC field configuration for the SENS_RES frame according to the NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification.

detaileddescription.para: SENS_RES 'Platform Config' field (b4-b1) value for Type 1 Tag platform. SENS_RES 'Platform Config' field (b7-b6) value for any platform except Type 1 Tag platform.

briefdescription.para: 'Platofrm Config' NFC field configuration for the SENS_RES frame according to the NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification.

detaileddescription.para: Type 2 Tag platform.
Type 4A Tag platform.
NFC-DEP Protocol.
NFC-DEP Protocol and Type 4A Tag platform).

briefdescription.para: Protocol NFC field (bits b7 and b6) configuration for the SEL_RES frame according to the NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification.

detaileddescription.para: Invalid configuration. Defaults to the same behavior as NRF_NFCT_MODULATION_CTRL_INTERNAL.
Use internal modulator only.
Transmit output digital modulation signal to a GPIO pin.
Use internal modulator and transmit output digital modulation signal to a GPIO pin.

briefdescription.para: Modulation output configuration.
Function for activating a specific NFCT task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be activated.

briefdescription.para: Function for returning the address of a specific NFCT task register.

Task.

simplesect.para: Task address.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of the NFCT event.

Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

briefdescription.para: Function for returning the address of a specific NFCT event register.

Event.

simplesect.para: Address.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling selected shortcuts.

Mask of shortcuts.

simplesect.para: Flags of the currently enabled shortcuts.

Shortcut mask.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling the selected interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_nfct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_nfct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling the selected interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_nfct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the NFCT modulation control pin.

detaileddescription.para: If a given signal is not needed, pass the NRF_NFCT_MOD_CTRL_PIN_NOT_CONNECTED value instead of its pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Modulation control pin.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the modulation control pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Modulation control pin selection.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the modulation output. It enables the output to a GPIO pin which can be connected to a second external.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Modulation control field configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the modulation output configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The configured modulation output.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the NFCT error status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The NFCT error status flags, defined in nrf_nfct_error_status_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the NFCT error status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Error flags to be cleared, defined in nrf_nfct_error_status_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the NFC frame reception status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The flags of the NFC frame reception status, defined in nrf_nfct_rx_frame_status_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the NFC frame reception status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Status flags to be cleared, defined in nrf_nfct_rx_frame_status_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the NFC tag state.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFC tag is disabled.
NFC tag is ramping up.
NFC tag is activated and idle.
NFC tag is receiving data.
Frame Delay Timer of the NFC tag is counting ticks since the last symbol of the last received frame.
NFC tag is transmitting data.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the NFC tag sleep state during the automatic collision resolution.

detaileddescription.para: The returned value is the last state before the autimatic collision resolution started.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFC tag was in IDLE state before the automatic collision resolution started.
NFC tag was in SLEEP_A state before the automatic collision resolution started.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the status of the external NFC field detection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The NFC field detection status. Status bits can be checked by using nrf_nfct_field_state_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the minimum Frame Delay Time value.

detaileddescription.para: This is the minimum value for Frame Delay Timer. It controls the shortest time between the last symbol of the last received frame and the start of the transmission of a new TX frame.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The minimum Frame Delay Time value in 13.56-MHz clock ticks.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the minimum Frame Delay Time value.

detaileddescription.para: This is the minimum value for Frame Delay Timer. It controls the shortest time between the last symbol of the last received frame and the start of the transmission of a new TX frame.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Minimum Frame Delay Time value in 13.56-MHz clock ticks.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the maximum Frame Delay Time value.

detaileddescription.para: This is the maximum value for Frame Delay Timer. It controls the longest time between the last symbol of the last received frame and the start of the transmission of a new TX frame. If no transmission starts before the Frame Delay Timer timeout, NRF_NFCT_ERROR_FRAMEDELAYTIMEOUT_MASK is set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The maximum Frame Delay Time value in 13.56-MHz clock ticks.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the maximum Frame Delay Time value.

detaileddescription.para: This is the maximum value for Frame Delay Timer. It controls the longest time between the last symbol of the last received frame and the start of the transmission of a new TX frame. If no transmission starts before the Frame Delay Timer timeout, NRF_NFCT_ERROR_FRAMEDELAYTIMEOUT_MASK is set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Maximum Frame Delay Time value in 13.56-MHz clock ticks.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the Frame Delay Mode configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The configured Frame Delay Mode.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the NFC Frame Delay Mode configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Frame Delay Mode configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the pointer to the NFCT RX/TX buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The configured pointer to the receive or transmit buffer.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the the NFCT RX/TX buffer (address and maximum length).

simplesect.para: Buffer for the NFC RX/TX data is used by EasyDMA and must be located in RAM.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the receive or transmit buffer.
Maximum receive or transmit length in bytes (size of the RAM buffer for EasyDMA).

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the NFCT RX/TX maximum buffer length.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The configured maximum receive or transmit length in bytes (size of the RX/TX buffer for EasyDMA).

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the flags for NFC frame transmission configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The flags of the NFCT frame transmission configuration, defined in nrf_nfct_tx_frame_config_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting up the flags of the NFC frame transmission configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Flags for NFCT TX configuration. Use nrf_nfct_tx_frame_config_t for setting.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the length of the configured transmission frame.

simplesect.para: NFC frames do not have to consist of full bytes only, therefore data amount for transmission is configured in number of bits.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Number of bits to be sent excluding CRC, parity, SoF, and EoF.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting up the NFC frame transmission.

detaileddescription.para: Set the number of TX bits excluding CRC, parity, SoF, and EoF.

simplesect.para: Source of data for transmission is set by using nrf_nfct_rxtx_buffer_set.
NFC frames do not have to consist of full bytes only, therefore data amount for transmission is configured in number of bits.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Overall number of bits to be sent.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the flags of the NFC frame reception configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The flags for NFCT frame reception configuration, defined in nrf_nfct_rx_frame_config_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting up the NFC frame reception.

simplesect.para: Destination for the received data is set using nrf_nfct_rxtx_buffer_set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFCT RX configuration flags. Use nrf_nfct_rx_frame_config_t for setting the desired configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the number of bits received from the NFC poller.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Flag for excluding CRC size from calculation.

simplesect.para: Number of received bits including or excluding CRC, and excluding parity and SoF/EoF framing.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the NFCID1 (NFC tag identifier).

simplesect.para: This function always returns the full configuration of the NFCID1 setting (10 bytes), regardless of the NFCID1 size. The NFCID1 size can be configured using nrf_nfct_sensres_nfcid1_size_set or nrf_nfct_nfcid1_set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to a buffer for the NDFCID1 parameter. The NFCID1 values are in little endian order, that is: |NFCID1_3RD_LAST|NFCID1_2ND_LAST|NFCID1_LAST|.

simplesect.para: Configured NFCID1 length

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the NFCID1 (NFC tag identifier).

simplesect.para: This function also configures the NFCIDSIZE field in the SENSRES register of the NFCT peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the buffer with NDFCID1 bytes.
Size of the NFCID1 in bytes.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the setting for the automatic collision resolution.

detaileddescription.para: The automatic collision resolution mechanism as defined in ISO 14443-3 and NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification 2.0, section 6.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
If automatic collision resolution is enabled.
If automatic collision resolution is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling the automatic collision resolution.

detaileddescription.para:
p_reg
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The automatic collision resolution mechanism as defined in ISO 14443-3 and NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification 2.0, section 6.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling the automatic collision resolution.

detaileddescription.para:
p_reg
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The automatic collision resolution mechanism as defined in ISO 14443-3 and NFC Forum Digital Protocol Technical Specification 2.0, section 6.

detaileddescription.para: The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

simplesect.para: NFCID1 (tag identifier) size.

simplesect.para: The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFCID1 (tag identifier) size.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the Bit Frame SDD field from the SENS_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The Bit Frame SDD field configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the Bit Frame SDD field in the SENS_RES frame configuration.

simplesect.para: The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The Bit Frame SDD field configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the Platform Config field from the SENS_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The Platform Config field configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the Platform Config field in the SENS_RES frame configuration.

simplesect.para: The SENS_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The Platform Config field configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking the CASCADE bit of the SEL_RES frame.

detaileddescription.para: The CASCADE bit in the SEL_RES register is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware and indicates the status of the NFCID1 read operation to the NFC poller according to the NFC Forum Digital Protocol Speficiation 2.0, section 6.8.2.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
If NFCID1 read procedure is not complete.
If NFCID1 read procedure is complete.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the Protocol field in the SEL_RES frame.

detaileddescription.para: The SEL_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Value of the Protocol field in the SEL_RES frame.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the Protocol field in the SEL_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SEL_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Value of the Protocol field in the SEL_RES frame.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the SEL_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SEL_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: SEL_RES frame configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the SEL_RES frame configuration.

detaileddescription.para: The SEL_RES frame is handled automatically by the NFCT hardware.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
SEL_RES frame configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling or disabling the NFC pad configuration.

detaileddescription.para: When the NFC pads are enabled, they are configured as the NFC antenna pins, and the NFC pins protection mechanism is enabled. When the NFC pads are disabled, they are configured as GPIO pins.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if the NFC pads are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking the NFC pads configuration.

detaileddescription.para: When the NFC pads are enabled, they are configured as the NFC antenna pins, and the NFC pins protection mechanism is enabled. When the NFC pads are disabled, they are configured as GPIO pins.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
NFC pads are enabled.
NFC pads are disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the bias configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure of bias configuration parameters.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the bias configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure to be filled with bias configuration parameters.
